thread.title: Justin Bieber India Purpose Tour: Varun Dhawan to attend concert | Zee News
thread.title_full: Justin Bieber India Purpose Tour: Varun Dhawan to attend concert | Zee News

title: Justin Bieber India Purpose Tour: Varun Dhawan to attend concert | Zee News
text:
Follow @ZeeNews 
Mumbai: Our very own ‘Hero’ Varun Dhawan is a big fan of Justin Bieber. The hunk of an actor could probably be the first one from the Bollywood brigade to grab his pass for Bieber’s India Purpose Tour. 
During a promotion event for his upcoming film ‘Badrinath Ki Dulhania’, Varun publicly proclaimed his love for the world`s most influential artist and has confirmed his presence at the concert apart from stating that he would like Bieber to watch his latest film opposite Alia Bhatt. 
The ‘Baby’ hit-maker’s concert will be held on May 10 at the DY Patil Stadium here. 
Arjun Jain, Director, White Fox India states, "We have already received confirmations from some of the biggest celebrities of India for the concert and will try to definitely integrate indigenous factors including Bollywood and cricket as part of the event." 
His latest jaunt is in support of his fourth album, the critically acclaimed ‘Purpose’, wherein he experimented with more exploratory electronic sounds. 
Apart from India, the Asia leg of the tour comprises Tel Aviv in Israel and Dubai in the United Arab Emirates. 
Touring in support of his fourth studio album ‘Purpose’ - which debuted at #1 in over 100 countries and has sold over eight million copies worldwide, Bieber is without a doubt one of the most successful pop stars in the world today with a recent world tour imbibing sold out dates across countries. 
(With ANI inputs) First Published: Wednesday, February 22, 2017 - 08:22 More from zeenews
